sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-form
        ref="form"
        lazy-validation
    >
      <v-text-field
          v-model="username"
          :counter="10"
          label="اسم"
          required
      ></v-text-field>

      <v-text-field
          v-model="password"
          label="پسورد"
          required
      ></v-text-field>


      <v-btn
          color="success"
          class="mr-4"
          @click="validate"
      >
        ورود
      </v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "LoginView",
  data() {
    return {
      username: '',
      password: '',
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
